meaningMnemonic: The <radical>restaurant</radical> radical and the <kanji>restaurant</kanji> kanji are the same! The meaning of this kanji also extends other resting places, like an <kanji>inn</kanji> or a <kanji>pavilion</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>restaurant</kanji> only serves <reading>tater</reading> (てい) tots. Really, would you ever want to go to a restaurant that didn't have tater tots? No.
